home.label: Questionnaire design tool.
home.poguesIntro: Pogues is the main entry point into the services provided by Bowie.
home.interfaceDescription: It is a graphical interface for designing questionnaires, enabling the creation of structural elements (sequences, questions) and dynamic elements (filters, controls, loops).
